elements.name: Verify adding the product for comparision from Product Display Page

steps.name: Open the Application URL in any supported browser
Enter any existing Product name into the Search text box field

steps.name: Hover the mouse cursor on Compare this Product option from the displayed Product Display Page
You have added Product Name to your product comparison! should be displayed
User should be taken to the Product Comparison page with the details of the Product that we have added for comparision.
